overview: Julie le Breton is the illegitimate daughter of Lady Rose, whose own background resembles that of her daughter. Julie is buffeted by the ill treatment of her mother's family and nearly ruined by a fortune hunter, but her own resources and goodness stand her in good stead.
tagline: Mrs. Humphrey Ward's world famous love story of passions and intrigues beneath the surface of British nobility.
title: Lady Rose's Daughter
